name: Race To $100K The Game
description:
Have you ever dreamed of winning $100,000? Want to ever to attempt it? NOW YOU CAN!!!! At Jon Jon Games Speedway you can win $100,000 to beat your opponent to win $100,000. Your enemy might screw you up :-)

CONTROLS:

W- Accelerate
A - Turn Left
S - Reverse/Brake
D - Turn Right

NOTE: THERE ARE CASES WHEN THE CAR CRASHES AND STAYS FLIPPED OVER. A FIX FOR THIS IN EARLY ACCESS, HIT "WINDOWS" KEY, RIGHT CLICK THE APPLICATION, CLOSE THE APPLICATION, AND RELAUNCH IT. THIS IS IN EARLY ACCESS. PAUSE MENU IS IN PROGRESS. :-)
